title: THIS 1BR/1BA APT. INCLUDES TWO WALK-IN CLOSETS & AN OVERSIZED PATIO
map_address: 1701 Rock Springs Drive near Lake Mead & Rock Springs Dr.
posting_body: ['Location, Community, and Quality Living.', 'CALL:', 'show contact info', 'x141', 'From $1,110', '.', '1 Bed 1 Bath .', '720 Sq.Ft', '* Unit 1118 - Available', 'Now', '* Unit 1147 - Available 09/15/22', 'Summerlin Entrada', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Address:', '1701 Rock Springs Drive Las Vegas, NV 89128', 'Want more information?', '<URL>', 'DESCRIPTION', 'Choose the luxury community of Summerlin Entrada and make this one-bedroom, one-bathroom model your next home.', 'In addition to the large interior with nine-foot ceilings, you’ll also appreciate the all-electric kitchen with a breakfast bar and a pantry.', 'Simplify laundry day with this layout’s large walk-in closets and full-size washer and dryer set.', 'After all your chores, comfortably relax in the huge living area that also offers sliding doors that lead to a private patio or balcony.', 'Within the pet-friendly community, you’ll enjoy access to a beautiful clubhouse, two refreshing pools, and a resident lounge.', 'You can also get a full-body workout at the fitness center or challenge neighbors to a friendly game of basketball or tennis at the sports courts.', 'Situated just off the 95 freeway, Summerlin Entrada places you near Pioneer Park and Sea Breeze Village shopping center.', 'Call for more details.', 'FLOORPLAN/UNIT\u2002 \u2002FEATURES', 'Washer/Dryer in Unit', 'Fireplace', 'Wet Bar', 'Pantry', 'Mirrored Closet Doors', 'Ceiling Fan', 'Dishwasher', 'Refrigerator', 'Cable', 'Large Closets', 'Vertical Blinds', 'Air Conditioning', 'Additional Storage', 'LEASE\u2002\u2002TERMS', '6 months, 9 months, 12 months, We offer multiple lease terms', 'Online Leasing URL:', '<URL>', 'OFFICE\u2002 \u2002HOURS', 'Monday', '9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Tuesday', '9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Wednesday', '9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Thursday', '9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Friday', '9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Saturday', '9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Sunday', '9:00am to 6:00pm', 'CALL US TODAY!', 'show contact info', 'x141', 'Equal Housing Opportunity']
